channel.title: Sales Gravy: PowerPrinciples
channel.description:
Sales Professionals are the Elite Athletes of the Business World. Like elite athletes you must train to win. To gain the winning edge in your career, to take home more money, more awards, and move to the top of your profession make the PowerPrinciples Podcast a part of your training regimen.
The Sales Gravy Podcast has been described as "passionate, motivating and essential for Sales Professionals and leaders who want to win and win big!"
Jeb Blount is a leading expert on sales, leadership and success and the author of "PowerPrinciples: Do you have the Winning Edge?"
